mentionedBy.name: Zoom Video Communications Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Holds 5.31% market share and is a notable competitor in the UCaaS (Unified Communications as a Service) space. Offers integrated communication solutions combining video conferencing with phone systems and messaging.
